price: Dielli sillet në drejtimin e vet të caktuar. Kështu e ka paracaktuar i Plotfuqishmi, i Gjithëdijshmi.
arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wal-shamsu tajrī limus'taqarrin lahā dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
